org.coniks.coniks_test_client

Class ConiksUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.ConiksUser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientUser

    public class ConiksUser
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a CONIKS user and all associated data

    • Constructor Summary

      Initializes the user with the username, public key data, public change key, and sets the default change and visibility policies (i.e.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allowPublicVisibility()
      Sets the public visibility flag to true
      void allowUnsignedChanges()
      Sets the unsigned key change flag to true
      void disallowPublicVisibility()
      Sets the public visibility flag to false

      Sets the unsigned key change flag to false

      Sets the user's key data.
      void unloadChangePubKey()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConiksUser

        public ConiksUser(java.lang.String uname,
          java.lang.String data,
          java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey changePk)
        Initializes the user with the username, public key data, public change key, and sets the default change and visibility policies (i.e. allowsUnsignedChanges and allowsPublicVisibility are both true.
        Parameters:
        uname - this user's username
        data - this user's key data
        changePk - this user's change public key

    • Method Detail

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Returns this CONIKS user's username
        Returns:
        the CONIKS user's username

      • getKeyData

        public java.lang.String getKeyData()
        Returns this CONIKS user's key data
        Returns:
        the CONIKS user's key data

      • getChangePubKey

        public java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey getChangePubKey()
        Returns this CONIKS user's data change public key
        Returns:
        the CONIKS user's data public key

      • isAllowsUnsignedChanges

        public boolean isAllowsUnsignedChanges()
        Indicates whether this CONIKS user allows unsigned key changes
        Returns:
        true if the user allows unsigned changes, false otherwise.

      • isAllowsPublicVisibility

        public boolean isAllowsPublicVisibility()
        Indicates whether this CONIKS user allows her key to have public visibility
        Returns:
        true if the user allows public visibility, false otherwise.

      • loadChangePubKey

        public void loadChangePubKey()
        Loads the user's key change public key from disk. This can be used after the user's key has been evicted from memory.

      • unloadChangePubKey

        public void unloadChangePubKey()
        Unloads the user's key change public key from memory.

      • setKeyData

        public void setKeyData(java.lang.String newData)
        Sets the user's key data. Expects that the caller has verified the change operation based on the user's key change policy.

      • setChangePubKey

        public void setChangePubKey(java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey changePk)
        Sets the user's change public key and saves the key to disk.
        Parameters:
        changePk - the DSA public key to set as the user's change key.

      • allowUnsignedChanges

        public void allowUnsignedChanges()
        Sets the unsigned key change flag to true

      • disallowUnsignedChanges

        public void disallowUnsignedChanges()
        Sets the unsigned key change flag to false

      • allowPublicVisibility

        public void allowPublicVisibility()
        Sets the public visibility flag to true

      • disallowPublicVisibility

        public void disallowPublicVisibility()
        Sets the public visibility flag to false
